content: > **seafield headband** is free when > you purchase the seafield sweater or > seafield concho from the ** sea > collection 3 ** no code necessary - > pop it in your cart and it will be free > upon checkout past purchases > applicable **seafield headband** go check your stash for any left over yarn from your projects and try this great beginners project for knitting in the round it comes in 5 sizes so measure your head and choose a size approx 1 5 - 2 smaller from the finished circumference measurements for a comfortable fit go smaller for a tighter fit knit one for your kids or let this be their first project in the round all of the yarns listed above were used by my wonderfully kind seafield concho 4 testers they used their concho left overs there are many combinations you can use up from your stash to make this for example double fingering holding dk and mohair together have fun selecting yours ________________________________________ **experience level** beginner **sizes** 1 2 3 4 5 finished height all sizes 8cm /3 25 finished circumference approx 37 5 41 25 45 49 25 53 75 cm /15 16 5 18 19 75 21 5 to fit head size approx 41 25 45 46 25 50 50 53 75 55 57 5 60 63 75 cm 16 5 18 18 5 20 20 21 5 22 23 5 24 25 5 for a tighter fit choose a smaller size **materials** yarn in sample myak yarn baby yak medium 50g 117m/ 125yds 100% baby yak worsted weight yarn in colourway teal 19 21 23 25 27 g 44 5 49 54 58 5 63 m 47 5 52 5 57 5 62 5 67 5 yds **needles & notions** 4mm/ us 6 40cm/ 16 circular needles dpns or longer circular if working magic loop adjust needle size as necessary to match gauge stitch marker 1 total tapestry/ darning needle **gauge** 19 5 sts x 32 rnds = 10 x 10cm/ 4 x 4 in textured pattern stitch in the round with relaxed blocked fabric 1 https //www ravelry com/bundles/the-sea-collection 2 https //y com/patterns/library/seafield-concho 3 https //www ravelry com/bundles/the-sea-collection 4 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/seafield-concho
